tagline: Richly formatted data tables in IPython
body:
### Install

Download and run 'python setup.py install'.

### License

Modified BSD.

### Authors

Eric Moyer (eric@lemoncrab.com)

### Download

You can download this project in either zip or tar formats.

You can also clone the project with Git by running:

``$ git clone git://github.com/epmoyer/ipy_table``

Get the source code on GitHub: [epmoyer/ipy_table](https://github.com/epmoyer/ipy_table)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Ipy_table
